enumDescription: The different kinds of order transactions.

values.name: AUTHORIZATION
values.description: An amount reserved against the cardholder's funding source. Money does not change hands until the authorization is captured.

values.name: CAPTURE
values.description: A transfer of the money that was reserved during the authorization stage.

values.name: CHANGE
values.description: Money returned to the customer when they have paid too much.

values.name: EMV_AUTHORIZATION
values.description: An authorization for a payment taken with an EMV credit card reader.

values.name: SALE
values.description: An authorization and capture performed together in a single step.
